meta.structure: pillars: RR, ALUM, TRAIN, OPS, STRAT, BUD

clusters.A: R&R: Strategy → Budget → Venue → Curriculum → Selection → Delivery → M&E → Alumni → Impact → Fundraising
clusters.B: Ask Karabo: Comms → Website → Roadshow → Youth workshops → Guide publication → Portal integration
clusters.C: Law Reform: Monitoring → Issue ID → Guide → Mobilisation → Parliamentary submission → Media
clusters.D: Donor Compliance: Activity implementation → Data collection → Financial reconciliation → Narrative report → Board submission

recurrence_rules.title: Weekly AS&T Check-in
recurrence_rules.notes: Internal coordination meeting — all team. Virtual unless noted.

recurrence_rules.title: Bi-Weekly Leadership Development 1:1s
recurrence_rules.notes: Protected leadership development sessions. No operational bookings.

recurrence_rules.title: Monthly Budget Monitoring Check
recurrence_rules.notes: Review burn rate vs AS&T FY27 sheet. Flag variances above 10%.

recurrence_rules.title: Bi-Weekly Team Coordination Meeting
recurrence_rules.notes: Coordinated by Fadia. Agenda template shared in advance. Action items tracked.

recurrence_rules.title: Monthly R&R Alumni Stipend Processing
recurrence_rules.notes: Process monthly data/airtime stipends for R&R alumni network leadership.

tasks.title: Define R&R 2026 Theme & Strategic Framework
tasks.notes: Set 2026 course theme: Movement Building in the Age of State Clampdown. Inform curriculum, facilitator recruitment, and comms tone.

tasks.title: Confirm R&R 2026 Budget & Donor Ceiling

donor.notes: HHCT MOU ceiling applies. Cross-reference DONOR_RR_Budget.

tasks.notes: Finalise per-participant cost model. Confirm 11th Hour $30k allocation is ring-fenced. Budget lines: accommodation, flights, venue, catering, facilitator fees.

tasks.title: Procure Venue for R&R 2026 Course

donor.notes: Comparative quotations required per DONOR_RR MOU procurement policy.

tasks.notes: Obtain minimum 3 quotes. Venue must accommodate ~30 participants residential, 28 Sep – 16 Oct 2026. Catering included.

tasks.title: Update R&R Curriculum & Facilitator Pack
tasks.notes: Update modules: anti-SLAPP, NDC accountability, mine blasting jurisprudence, wellness for activists. Brief all facilitators by end of August.

tasks.title: Publish R&R 2026 Call for Nominations

donor.notes: Aligned to HHCT Outcome 2 relaunch objective.

tasks.notes: Publish call via CER website, alumni network, partner organisations. Coordinate with Ask Karabo comms for social media push.

tasks.title: Design R&R Participant Selection Framework

donor.notes: Must align with donor diversity and inclusion outcomes.

tasks.notes: Develop scoring rubric. Prioritise women, marginalised communities, extractive-affected areas. Document for donor reporting.

tasks.title: Shortlist & Confirm R&R 2026 Participants

donor.notes: Selection must be documented for donor reporting.

tasks.notes: Shortlist ~30 activists. Send confirmation letters, travel briefing packs and pre-reading. Confirm dietary & accessibility needs.

tasks.title: Deliver R&R 2026 Course

donor.notes: Core HHCT funded flagship. 11th Hour $30k supports this event.

tasks.notes: 3-week residential Rights & Remedies course. Theme: Movement Building in the Age of State Clampdown. All staff on deck. Daily M&E check-ins.

tasks.title: Finalise M&E Framework for R&R 2025 Cohort
tasks.notes: Develop tracking templates for 2025 cohort project action plan implementation. Deploy survey tool for 6-month post-course check-in.

tasks.title: Community Visit 1 — Eastern Cape Teach Back

donor.notes: Community visits documented for HHCT Outcome 1 reporting.

tasks.notes: Visit R&R 2025 cohort in Eastern Cape. Teach-back session, review project action plan progress, collect M&E data.

tasks.title: Community Visit 2 — Gauteng Teach Back
tasks.notes: Visit Gauteng-based R&R 2025 cohort. Peer exchange workshop. Document implementation progress and challenges.

tasks.title: Community Visit 3 — Port Nolloth Teach Back

donor.notes: Third of three planned community visits.

tasks.notes: Visit Port Nolloth site. Peer exchange, project action plan review.

tasks.title: Analyse 5+ Years of R&R Alumni Data

donor.notes: Feeds into impact report required by HHCT.

tasks.notes: Pull together 5+ years of alumni data. Analyse trajectories: legal wins, movement roles, organisational growth. Draft visualisations for impact report.

tasks.title: Draft & Publish R&R Alumni Impact Report

donor.notes: Public-facing report required for HHCT Year 3 reporting.

tasks.notes: Commission designer. Include alumni case studies, data visualisations, testimonials. Publish on CER website and R&R microsite.

tasks.title: Develop 2027–2030 R&R Fundraising Strategy
tasks.notes: Define R&R 2027-2030 vision. Map funding landscape. Draft theory of change for next phase. Propose scale model.

tasks.title: Finalise Ask Karabo Communications Strategy
tasks.notes: Finalise comms plan: demo videos, dissemination strategy, website update roadmap. Align with Portal team on messaging consistency.

tasks.title: Launch Ask Karabo Website Phase 2
tasks.notes: Implement phase 2 website design. Data-free, mobile-first. Include question submission portal, EJ resource library, community radio station links.

tasks.title: Plan & Coordinate Ask Karabo Roadshow Logistics
tasks.notes: Plan 6-day mobile clinic roadshow (7 CER staff + 30 participants per site). Confirm sites, book travel, accommodation and venues. Coordinate with ad hoc clinic committee.

tasks.title: Deliver Ask Karabo Roadshow — Mobile Clinic
tasks.notes: Deliver mobile legal clinic roadshow across 3-6 sites. 30 participants per session. Film and photograph for content. Coordinate with community media.

tasks.title: Plan & Facilitate x3 Youth & Learner Workshops
tasks.notes: Workshops for learners and varsity students on environmental rights and EJ. Demystify narratives, build EJ literacy. Include data-free interactive elements.

tasks.title: Finalise CME Guides — Mine Rehab & Children's Rights

donor.notes: Printing, design and translation under AK budget.

tasks.notes: Finalise 2 CME guides: (1) Mine Rehabilitation, (2) Environment & Children's Rights. Commission translation into 2 languages. Publish and distribute.

tasks.title: Develop Learner Environmental Justice Curriculum
tasks.notes: Formalise structure of learner environmental programme. Develop EJ curriculum for schools. Align with national curriculum where possible.

tasks.title: Integrate Ask Karabo with Environmental Violations Portal
tasks.notes: Streamline violation reporting from AK campaign into portal. Train roadshow participants on portal usage. Improve data flow to case and advocacy teams.

tasks.title: Human Rights Festival — CER Participation
tasks.notes: Represent CER at Human Rights Festival. Distribute AK materials, CME guides and portal info. Film content for social media.

tasks.title: Produce Ask Karabo Merchandise & Promo Materials
tasks.notes: Design and procure AK branded merchandise for roadshows: tote bags, stickers, printed guides. Align with website and campaign visual identity.

tasks.title: Monitor Portfolio Committees (Monthly)

donor.notes: Documented in monthly parliamentary liaison reports.

tasks.notes: Monitor: forestry, fisheries, environment; mineral & petroleum; energy & electricity; water & sanitation. Share updates via knowledge hub. Involve R&R alumni.

tasks.title: Track New Gazettes, Law Reports & Cabinet Statements
tasks.notes: Monitor ELA newsletters, Saflii law reports, cabinet statements. Circulate relevant updates to all CER attorneys through shared knowledge hub. Flag MPRDA/UPRDA amendments.

tasks.title: Draft Mine Blasting Community Guide
tasks.notes: Finalise community-facing guide on mine blasting standards. Cover: blast risk committees, seismograph installation, reporting to Mine Health & Safety Inspectorate. Translate into Zulu and Sotho.

tasks.title: Mobilise Activists for Parliamentary Submissions
tasks.notes: Facilitate R&R alumni and community partner engagement with parliamentary processes. Facilitate parliamentary questions for written answer. Run CME-style accessible submission campaign.

tasks.title: Design Accessible Parliamentary Submissions Campaign
tasks.notes: Design campaign making draft law amendments easy to understand. Develop submission template for activists. Disseminate via AK platform, CER website and partner networks.

tasks.title: Develop Law Reform Media & Op-Ed Strategy
tasks.notes: Write and place 2+ op-eds: (1) EJ leadership & women defenders; (2) admin justice & EJ. Draft academic article on CME, mine blasting or EJ movement for scholarly publication.

tasks.title: Launch Imbabala Mine Rehabilitation Litigation
tasks.notes: Launch precedent-setting mine rehabilitation case. Engage James and correspondent counsel. Coordinate community plaintiff support. Target first/second quarter filing.

tasks.title: Civil Damages Blasting Case — Case Building
tasks.notes: Build civil damages claim for community infrastructure damage from mine blasting. Develop jurisprudence on polluter-pays principle. Coordinate technical seismograph evidence.

tasks.title: Anti-SLAPP Engagement with CALS
tasks.notes: Continue engagement with CALS on anti-SLAPP campaign and policy advocacy. Track legislative developments. Support activists facing SLAPP suits.

tasks.title: Collate CME Statistics & Revive Disclosure Advocacy
tasks.notes: Collate CME statistics across departments via PAIA requests. Advocate for consistent publication of CME stats. Engage local government on violation reporting chains.

tasks.title: Incorporate CER Work into NDC Accountability Advocacy
tasks.notes: Integrate AS&T community and CME work into NDC implementation tracking. Publish at least 2x op-eds on CME-Just Transition linkages. Coordinate with PCC team.

tasks.title: Women Activists Profiling & Sequel Report

donor.notes: Report designer fees and data costs.

tasks.notes: Profile women activists in environmental and climate activism. Produce sequel report on how women are disproportionately affected by climate change. Target mid-year publication.

tasks.title: HHCT RR Addendum — Confirm Implementation Schedule
tasks.notes: Review Jan 2026 addendum obligations. Confirm implementation schedule with team. Flag any deviations from MOU Annexure A budget lines.

tasks.title: Q1 M&E Data Collection

donor.notes: Required for all active donor streams.

tasks.notes: Collect Q1 M&E data across all pillars. Update tracking template. Flag outcomes at risk. Prepare data pack for narrative report.

tasks.title: Q1 Financial Reconciliation & Burn Rate Review
tasks.notes: Reconcile Q1 actual spend vs budget. Identify underspend/overspend by line item. Flag reallocation needs to MK for approval before Q2 activities begin.

tasks.title: Draft Q1 Donor Narrative Report — HHCT
tasks.notes: Draft quarterly narrative report for HHCT. Include: activities vs planned, outcome progress, financial summary, risks and mitigation. Circulate internally before submission.

tasks.title: Submit Q1 Report to HHCT & 11th Hour

donor.notes: Submit via donor portal. Retain signed copy.

tasks.notes: Final submission of Q1 report. Include financial statements. File confirmation of receipt.

tasks.title: Q2 M&E Data Collection
tasks.notes: Collect Q2 M&E data. Mid-year review: assess if on track for annual targets. Prepare adjustment recommendations for MK.

tasks.title: Q2 Financial Reconciliation & Mid-Year Review
tasks.notes: Full mid-year financial reconciliation. Reallocate underspent budget lines if needed. Prepare mid-year financial narrative.

tasks.title: Draft Q2 Donor Narrative Report — HHCT
tasks.notes: Draft mid-year narrative. Highlight R&R preparations, AK roadshow outcomes, law reform activities. Submit by end of August.

tasks.title: Submit Q2 Report & Board Presentation
tasks.notes: Submit Q2 report to donors. Prepare and present AS&T mid-year update to CER Board. Include risk register and strategy adjustments.

tasks.title: Document & File Management System Maintenance
tasks.notes: Maintain structured, accessible document filing system. Weekly updates. Ensure all programme outputs are consistently filed. Reduces admin risk and improves continuity.

tasks.title: Task Tracking & Team Commitment Follow-Up
tasks.notes: Bi-weekly follow-up on team task commitments. Use task tracker and reminders. Flag overdue items to MK. Keep action log from all team meetings.

tasks.title: R&R M&E Support — Track Participant Progress
tasks.notes: Track R&R 2026 participant progress during and after the course. Collect post-course engagement data. Administer surveys. Input to impact report pipeline.

tasks.title: Purchase Portable Training Workshop Kit

donor.notes: Workshop and meeting costs budget line.

tasks.notes: Procure portable training kit: flip charts, markers, printed materials, basic AV. Used across all community visit and training activities.

tasks.title: Plan High-Impact Community Legal Training
tasks.notes: Plan at least 1 short high-impact training for community struggles: mine blasting, climate impact assessments, or defender safety. Tailor to active litigation/advocacy needs.

tasks.title: Deliver High-Impact Community Legal Training (June)
tasks.notes: Deliver planned community training. Cover: legal remedies, evidence gathering, regulatory engagement, safety protocols for activists.

tasks.title: Waste Management Legal Training
tasks.notes: Plan and lead at least 1 waste management legal training. Identify municipalities and corporates for accountability work. Coordinate with PCC team on waste violation data.

tasks.title: Gender & EJ 3-Day Workshop (Mmatshilo Motsei)
tasks.notes: 3-day gender workshop facilitated by Mmatshilo Motsei. Consolidate CER Gender and EJ work. All AS&T attorneys attend. Output: internal gender lens framework.

tasks.title: Wellness Guide for Activists — Finalise & Publish
tasks.notes: Improve and finalise the mini wellness guide for activists. Commission design. Print and distribute via roadshow, R&R course, and partner networks.

tasks.title: Deliver x2 Wellness Trainings for Activists

donor.notes: Facilitator, venue, catering, travel budget lines.

tasks.notes: Plan and lead 2 wellness trainings. Cover: burnout prevention, security practices, self-care as political act. Include at least 1 for R&R alumni cohort.

tasks.title: Political Workshop — School of Unity & Liberation Pilot
tasks.notes: Political workshop for 10 selected activists using School of Unity and Liberation curriculum. Test run. Document for scaling in future years.

tasks.title: Paralegal Partnership — ACAOSA/CAOSA Training
tasks.notes: Formalise partnership with at least 1 national paralegal body (ACAOSA/CAOSA). Deliver EJ-focused paralegal training. Receive community-based advice training in exchange.

tasks.title: Team Leadership Development Programme

donor.notes: R5000 per team member training budget.

tasks.notes: Year-long team development. Each AS&T member owns one strategic leadership domain: budgeting, community management, fundraising, media, M&E, or external representation.

tasks.title: R&R Alumni Network Wide Convening
tasks.notes: Convene full alumni network meeting. Agenda: reflect on 2025, develop 2026 action plan, consolidate/elect leadership structure, set NWG constitution. Hybrid format.

tasks.title: Alumni Leadership & Governance Training
tasks.notes: Leadership and governance training for alumni network. Strengthen governance systems, build capacity for self-management, clarify roles and accountability structures.

tasks.title: Alumni Strategic Planning Workshop
tasks.notes: Strategic planning workshop for alumni network. Develop comprehensive 2026-2028 strategy. Enable independent programme delivery from provincial structures.

tasks.title: Alumni NWG — Finalise TOR & Constitution
tasks.notes: Meeting with Alumni NWG to finalise TOR/Constitution, governance structures, programmes, funding model and coalition planning for 2026.

tasks.title: Commission 3 Alumni Impact Case Studies
tasks.notes: Commission 3 high-quality, public-facing case studies written by R&R alumni on successful use of legal remedies post-training. Edit and publish on CER website.

tasks.title: Alumni Monthly Stipend Programme Launch

donor.notes: Data support and communication costs budget line.

tasks.notes: Set up and administer monthly financial stipends for R&R alumni network leadership. Stipends for data/airtime to support activist work and CER correspondence.

tasks.title: Community Media Strategy Development
tasks.notes: Develop community media engagement strategy linking alumni network to CER advocacy. Train alumni on leveraging community radio and digital platforms for EJ messaging.

tasks.title: Movement Support — SAWC, MEJCON, VEJA
tasks.notes: Continued support to environmental justice movements: SAWC, MEJCON, VEJA. Attend convenings, provide legal information, facilitate peer learning.

tasks.title: Write R&R Op-Ed — Movement Building & State Clampdown
tasks.notes: Write and publish op-ed setting the tone for the 2026 R&R theme. Target Mail & Guardian or Daily Maverick. Pre-R&R publication.

tasks.title: EJFund Board — Chair Quarterly Meetings
tasks.notes: Chair EJFund Board: strategic planning (Feb), minimum 4 quarterly meetings, attend and present at annual Grantee Convening. Maintain partnership with EJFund grantees.

tasks.title: Convene EJ Partner Calendar Alignment Session
tasks.notes: Convene key EJ partners (EJFund, Benchmarks, groundWork, LAC, PILG) for 2026 calendar alignment. Create shared 2026-2027 movement calendar. Facilitate mutual promotion.

tasks.title: Zero Hour 2.0 — Plan, Draft & Publish

donor.notes: Printing, design and travel budget lines.

tasks.notes: Plan, prepare and publish Zero Hour 2.0 report. Document state of environmental enforcement and activist criminalisation. Commission designer. Align with R&R and AK comms calendar.

tasks.title: HRD Response Funding Database
tasks.notes: Map and develop comprehensive database of HRD response funding organisations. Collate stats on activists supported. Help activists at risk access emergency funding.

tasks.title: Environmental Violations Portal — Reports & Training

donor.notes: Portal guides, reporting dashboard, training docs.

tasks.notes: Ongoing portal training across all programme activities. Develop comprehensive report on portal usage and impact. Publish portal stats quarterly. Align with case team needs.

tasks.title: Q1 Budget Variance Review

donor.notes: Covers RR and SADF/11th Hour streams.

tasks.notes: Review Q1 actual spend vs AS&T FY27 budget sheet. Flag lines >10% off-track. Propose reallocations. Report to Executive.

tasks.title: Q2 Budget Variance Review
tasks.notes: Review mid-year budget position across all pillars. Cross-reference BUDGET_FY27_29_Consolidated_Draft. Confirm forecasts for H2 especially R&R course.

tasks.title: Q3 Budget Variance Review
tasks.notes: Q3 review immediately post R&R course delivery. Verify all course expenses reconciled. Check against DONOR_RR budget ceiling. Prepare year-end forecast.

tasks.title: Year-End Financial Close & Donor Reconciliation
tasks.notes: Full year-end financial close. Reconcile all donor streams. Prepare financial statements for annual audit. Input into FY28 budget planning cycle.
